item.title: Back to 'System' package diagram
item.description: Switch canvas to System package diagram.

item.title: Add provided interface to 'Device' component
item.description: From the Palette, expand the 'Components' section, select Provided Interface and drag it ouf of the 'Device' component to add the interface to the component.

item.title: Create new component
item.description: From the Palette, expand the 'Components' section, select Component then click on canvas. Set the name in the pop up dialog to 'TestBench'

item.title: Connect the components
item.description: Add a Required Interface to 'TestBench'. Select the end the 'Device' provided interface, and drag the "ball" to the "cup" at the end of the 'TestBench' required interface to establish a connection between the components.

item.title: Create new interface
item.description: From the Palette, expand the 'Components' section, select Interface then click on canvas. Set the name in the pop up dialog to 'Verification'

item.title: Add new interface operation
item.description: Select 'Verification' interface, right-click on it and select New > Operation. Set the name in the pop up dialog to 'verify'

item.title: Formalize interface
item.description: Right-click on the connected interfaces, select Formalize, and pick 'Verification'

item.title: Add OAL to the interface operation on 'Device' port

action.param5: create object instance monitor of MONITOR; generate MONITOR1:go to monitor;

item.description: Open the 'verify' interface operation under the 'Device' component's Verification port (Port1). Create an instance of the 'Monitor' class, and send event to it.

item.title: Open the TestBench component diagram
item.description: Double-click on the 'TestBench' component to open the component diagram.

item.title: Create new package
item.description: Right-click on the canvas, select New > Package. Set the name in the pop up dialog to 'Testing'

item.title: Open 'Testing' package diagram
item.description: Double-click on the 'Testing' package to open the package diagram

item.title: Create new function
item.description: Right-click on the canvas, select New > Function. Note that functions do not show up on the canvas. You can find the function in the Model Explorer. Set the name in the pop up dialog to 'test'

item.title: Add OAL to 'test' function
item.description: Write action language in 'test' to send the 'verify' message out the port and through the interface.
